this is the crack for the new update i guess? Well thx m8. 

The sad thing is i bought the game and every time i want to play (whitout cracks) i get a "cnc3game.dat" error. So i must have the crack so thanks for this buddy :)

Thx.. I had problems by starting the game after update, but i used the NO-CD crack from version 1.1 i just put it in the folder 1.2 also and it works fine to :) 
i don't know if i miss something important in the game then. so it is fine that the new crack is here now.. thanks
